```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyr)
```

```{r}
testtarget = as.matrix(read.csv("Y_test.csv"))
```

```{r}
NN_pred = as.matrix(read.csv("Task5_NN4_Prediction.csv"))
```

```{r}
# Read XGB prediction file
# XGB_pred = as.matrix(read.csv("filename"))
```


```{r}
# correlation between NN prediction and Ground Truth

all_cor = c()
for (i in seq(1,ncol(pred),1)) {
  all_cor = c(all_cor, cor(NN_pred[,i], testtarget[,i]))
}
(NN_GT_cor = mean(all_cor))
```

```{r}
# correlation between XGB prediction and Ground Truth

all_cor = c()
for (i in seq(1,ncol(pred),1)) {
  all_cor = c(all_cor, cor(XGB_pred[,i], testtarget[,i]))
}
(XGB_GT_cor = mean(all_cor))
```


```{r}
# correlation between XGB prediction and NN prediction

all_cor = c()
for (i in seq(1,ncol(pred),1)) {
  all_cor = c(all_cor, cor(XGB_pred[,i], NN_pred[,i]))
}
(XGB_NN_cor = mean(all_cor))
```
